subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Frankenization!
author: Lisby
full_text:
You've been in the Pepsi and jellybeans again, I see. ;)

Ann

On Apr 1, 2008, at 2:32 AM, Frank Sumption wrote:

>  My Bad! I don't know what I measured, but the tuning voltage on  
> the '469 is pretty close to the standard 0 to 8 volt signal. I had  
> to add the level shifter stage. You could just use the symmetry  
> control on the triangle wave generator, but the sweep is slower at  
> the bottom, then the top, which may not be noticable in operation.
>
>  I mixed the two stereo signals from the headphone output together  
> to form a mono output, this is the combined output of the mixer/ 
> buffer stage.
>
>  Frankentwistertech
>
>
> How well do you know your celebrity gossip? Talk celebrity  
> smackdowns here.
>
>  <AM-then-FM.mp3>
